dataIdInfo.idPurp: Tools to use Amazon Web Services Elastic Map Reduce (Managed Hadoop)
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Tools to use Amazon Web Services Elastic Map Reduce (Managed Hadoop) . Users can start an EMR cluster, check its status, query it, and terminate it.

Users can also use the tools included to upload and download from local disk to and from S3. EMR refers to S3 as the location for the input and output of the data. By including those tools users can define a complete workflow for leveraging EMR through ArcGIS Desktop.
